name: Email OTP Authenticator
author: Chandan Shrivastava

sections.description:
Use this plugin to Register, Login and Verify users or guests by sending an email with OTP only. This is very FAST, FRIENDLY and SECURE technique.

FEATURES:

  • Register users with their email and OTP only.
  • Login registered users with OTP only.
  • Verify guest users without registration to access any specific content.
  • Verify registered users without login to access any specific content.
  • Verify logged in users to access any sensitive data.
  • Set the OTP email limits to send in a specific period.
  • Set the OTP expiry time.
  • Set wrong OTP attempt limits for different features.
  • Block domains of disposable email providers.
  • Allow only domains of some specific email providers.
  • Manage OTP popup box template and design.
  • Create Menus, Links or Buttons for popup using the menu editor, Shortcode or HTMLcode.
  • Drive further operations with our external functions.
  • Zero dependency on Google/Facebook etc APIs to provide EASY Login/Register/Verification features.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES:

  • Provide subscriber facilities to guest visitors even without an account on your website with our OTP verification and redirect to a link with the token.
  • Provide subscriber facilities to your users even without login in your website with our OTP verification and redirect to a link with the token.
  • Lock account anywhere with our OTP verification feature without session expiration or auto logout.
  • Protect sensitive/important records with re-verify email and OTP verification features and logout after limited wrong OTP attempts.
  • Provide two layers of security, password reset with OTP and more features to your users with additional protection, verification and approval.

Send OTP through email to Login/Register/Verify the users without any password. This is very fast, user friendly and more secure technique. Optimize your WordPress website with this new and advance feature.

This plugin provides the FACILITIES as Register, Login, Verify, Authenticate users without any PASSWORD. The PROCESS is very Fast, Direct, User Friendly and More Secure. The INTEGRATION of this plugin is very Easy, Simple and Without Coding. Supporting WooCommerce and many other advance plugins/systems.

Pirated, Nulled, Cracked, Hacked or Shared copy of this plugin, Leads to easy unauthorized access to your sensitive website data.

sections.installation:
Installing the plugin:

  1. Unzip the plugin’s directory into wp-content/plugins.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The settings page will be available under settings menu (Settings >> Email OTP Authn)
sections.faq:
Can I login into WordPress admin using OTP?

  • Yes, you can login into WordPress admin by OTP(One Time Password).

Can I add login popup window on my website menu?

  • Yes, you can add login popup into your website menu by add a class name i.e emailotpauthn-popup in parent of login link.

Can I add verification popup window on my website menu or anywhere?

  • Yes, you can add login/verification popup into your website menu by add a class name i.e emailotpauthn-popup in parent of login/verification link.

Can I process the authenticator response after failed/success verification?

  • Yes, you can process login/verification popup response through jquery/javascript/php code at any where in your website.

Can A guest user register or verify his email?

  • Yes, this facility add in the plugin version 4.2.1 or above.
